site_name: Land Adjacent To Manhattan Business Park
description: Application for a Non-Material Change (Section 21, Schedule 17 of the High Speed Rail (London-West Midlands) Act 2017)  seeking to allow changes to the entrance gate, green roof, fan room footprint, roof parapet handrail, design of headhouse building, earthworks and hard landscape levels in relation to approval reference 205148HS2 dated 25/03/2021 for Development authorised by the High Speed Rail (London-West Midlands) Act 2017 relating to the Westgate vent shaft headhouse and compound, including building works, road vehicle parking, earthworks, fencing/walls and artificial lighting equipment
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The proposed changes in relation to the entrance gate, green roof, fan room footprint, roof parapet handrail, design of headhouse building, earthworks and hard landscape levels approved under planning application ref: 205148HS2 dated 25/03/2021 are considered to be non-material changes in accordance with Section 21, Schedule 17 of the High Speed Rail (London-West Midlands) Act 2017.
1. The details hereby approved shall be implemented in accordance with the following approved drawings and documents:

1MC04-SCJ-IN-TEM-SS03_SL05-000001 (Submission Letter); 1MC04-SCJ-IN-TEM-SS03_SL05-000001 (Indicative Mitigation Letter); 1MC04-SCJ-IN-STA-SS03_SL05-000001 (Written Statement); 1MC04-SCJ_SDH-AR-DGA-SS03_SL05-180012 (General Arrangement Plan (C03)); 1MC04-SCJ_SDH-AR-DEL-SS03_SL05-180031 (Elevations (C02)); 1MC04-SCJ_SDH-AR-DSE-SS03_SL05-180021 (Sections (C02)); 1MC04-SCJ_SDH-AR-DPH-SS03_SL05-180091 (Materials Board (P04)); 1MC04-SCJ_SDH-LS-DGA-SS03_SL05-181003 (Landscape GA Plan - Hard Landscape and Earthworks (C03)); 1MC04-SCJ_SDH-LS-DSE-SS03_SL05-182011 (Earthworks Cross Sections (C03)); 1MC04-SCJ_SDH-EL-DDE-SS03_SL05-184451 (External Lighting and Installation Details (P04)); 1MC04-SCJ_SDH-AR-DLO-SS03_SL05-180001 (Location Plan (C02)); 1MC04-SCJ_SDH-AR-DEL-SS03_SL05-180032 (Illustrative Elevations (P03)); 1MC04-SCJ_SDH-LS-DGA-SS03_SL05-181002 (Overview Plan (C03)); 1MC04-SCJ_SDH-LS-DGA-SS03_SL05-181004 (Landscape GA Plan - Indicative Mitigation (C03)); 1MC04-SCJ_SDH-LS-DSE-SS03_SL05-182001 (Indicative Mitigation Cross Sections (C03)); 1MC04-SCJ_SDH-LS-DGA-SS03_SL05-189260 (Photomontage Viewpoint 26 (P02)); 1MC04-SCJ_SDH-LS-DGA-SS03_SL05-189270 (Photomontage Viewpoint 27 (P02)); 1MC04-SCJ_SDH-LS-DGA-SS03_SL05-189330 (Photomontage Viewpoint 28 (P02)); 1MC04-SCJ_SDH-EL-DGA-SS03_SL05-180451 (External Lighting - Zones and Controls (C02)); 1MC04-SCJ_SDH-EL-DGA-SS03_SL05-180452 (External Lighting Lux Levels - Under Normal Operation (C02)); 1MC04-SCJ_SDH-EL-DGA-SS03_SL05-180453 (External Lighting - Site Unoccupied (C02))
Reason: In order to ensure that the permission granted is defined in accordance with Schedule 17 of the High Speed Rail (London - West Midlands) Act 2017
